website_summaries.verdict: Several said they used it to gauge whether it was time to get out a more accurate thermometer to get a true reading on their child.
pros: Many reported they found this thermometer to be accurate
Easy to tell which mode you're in
Color alarms alert you to fever reading
Thermometer can store and recall up to 20 readings to track trends

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer works so great! We have had one in the past where you have to drag it across the forehead and down my the ear however my son didn't do well with that one. This works perfect. You just have to put it on your forehead for a second and it grabs the temperature so quickly! I do like that you can also take the top off and able to use the tempature in the ear, however I think my go to method is going to be the forehead. Thanks for making taking care of a sick kid a little less painless!
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is great. A slow swipe across forehead and you have your temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Bella's mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thermometer I’ve ever used!! The price is great! It’s so much faster than any other thermometer and with kids you need that! And I love it has two options! 10 out of 10 would recommend!! I wish I would’ve gotten it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Savy

customer_reviews.title: I like this thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I like this thermometer, is quick and easy to use even for me who is electronically challenged. I love that it has the option of head or ear temp as well. The results are quick the screen is large and easy to read, i have a baby i i defiantly going to use it on him. also comes with a nice travel bag! thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use digital thermometer. I opened up expecting I was going to need batteries and I love that it already came with them. Most items I purchase you have to supply your own batteries, so this was a pleasant surprise. Very easy to use and you get results quick. Came with a bag to store it in as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sara BehmerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Inaccurate and inconsistent readings. I would not trust this thermometer. After testing it on several family members several times, readings were all over the place for each of them. I’m sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mariscal

customer_reviews.title: disappointed not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: first thing i noticed was it was cheaply made(plastic). even though it was easy to use but it was not accurate when u used the ear prone. when i used it on my 2 months old it read he have a fever when the forehead said normal temp. i tried it on me when i’m not sick it said i have fever too. returned. suprised it have high review and amazon choice for baby register.
customer_reviews.author: Teng Yang

customer_reviews.title: Terrifyingly inaccurate!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this after it told me my 2 month old son had a low grade fever of 99.1 when he actually had a fever of 103.4! Spend the extra money to buy a good quality thermometer from Braun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use with the ear option
customer_reviews.text: The thermometer was shipped quickly and comes with a soft bag to store the thermometer. It is easy to use with the ear option. My little daughter is 18m old; whenever she is sick, she doesn't like it when we check her temperature. But she really likes this ear thermometer. She actually wants me put it in her ear and measure the temperature. So the problem is now solved! The reading is quick, the green light is for normal, and the red one - for fever. The cap is removed easily to enable the ear function. I highly recommended it. Every family should have one.
customer_reviews.author: Armin

customer_reviews.title: Not for newborns
customer_reviews.text: This item is advertised as good for adding to your baby registry. I bought it and the first thing it says in the instructions is “do not use on newborns”. I’m very upset because I opened it already and can’t return it and now I have to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: GSK

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I should have spent more on a better quality one than getting this. I need a reliable thermometer as I have three kids under the age of five. This thermometer has honestly scared the daylights out of me several times because it has given inaccurate high readings. At other times, it has given inaccurate low temperatures. I wish I'd thrown it away earlier, and will order something different as even though the old fashioned ones are time consuming, at least they are reliable. Going to try and find an electric one like this, but one that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Anon

customer_reviews.title: It keeps giving different temperatures literally, every single time ...
customer_reviews.text: It keeps giving different temperatures literally, every single time I take.. Even when it is right after taking it once. It keeps increasing progressively. So if you take the temperature of a healthy person after taking the temperature of a sick person, it'll still show a higher temperature for the healthy person
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Not very accurate. It only takes a second to take a temp, but the readings are so inconsistent. Don't know that I can trust it. I've gone back to using the old digital thermometers. I also bought a pacifier thermometer from Walgreens. It was way cheaper and way more consistent.
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: This is a toy
customer_reviews.text: If you are buying this for a child to play nurse or doctor, then this is the thermometer for you. If you would like an accurate reading of temperature, do not buy this. I can use it in succession over a minute and I will get different readings every single time and not close to each other. For instance, the first reading will be 99.6, 2nd- 96.4, 3rd- 98.2. This is completely not useful and there is no way to tell if there is a fever state by reading this thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: sistersilence

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why this has a good rating.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work! Junk. Random temperatures. Temperatures are not consistent. Not sure why this has a good rating.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Matlock

customer_reviews.title: DANGER! DONT BUY Currently in the emergency room because this thing didn’t register.
customer_reviews.text: We are sitting in the ER with our daughter. The thermometer didn’t register that she had a fever. We were surprised because she was hot. We tried several times, never to receive an accurate reading. Finally we took a rectal temperature. She was 104.1. We had to go to the ER. DONT BUY!!! She ended up having a febrile seizures and this thing still said she was 97.8... buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Burn danger
customer_reviews.text: I took out the batteries and my granddaughter tried to put one back in but got it backwards and a little ajar. The battery instantly got extremely hot and burned her hand, my hand, a hole in her play table and my carpet has a big black burned spot on it. I had to wrap it in a lot of Kleenex in order to pick it up and throw it in the sink to cool off enough to throw away.
customer_reviews.author: Hiker Dan

customer_reviews.title: It is missing the attachment to do the head reading ...
customer_reviews.text: It is missing the attachment to do the head reading and also when checking the temperature back to back it doesn’t have a steady reading it changes each time
customer_reviews.author: candace

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, then died
customer_reviews.text: We've had this thermometer for just over a year now. It's worked great until recently. Now only the ear one works which is difficult. There's no indicator light-like other brands-that you have it pointed correctly towards the ear drum so it takes several reads. The forehead portion doesn't work at all. We've kept it clean, and just to make sure, cleaned it again with rubbing alcohol and nothing. It's a disappointment, especially since we have 3/6 sick kids currently. ugh. Try a different brand if you want a forehead one. This one didn't last long enough for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Really inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I liked the cost and the construction of this product. It's very easy to use. But I get WILDLY different readings head vs. ears. And different readings between ears. Sometimes I'll have a 101 temp in my right ear and a hypothermic reading in my left. Touching your kid's head to identify if he has a fever is more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: katenan89

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable thermometer...5 degree difference with consecutive readings.
customer_reviews.text: Unreliable thermometer...gave me readings between 97.8-102.3 within the span of 10 minutes. I thought my 12 yo Braun ear thermometer was in need of an upgrade so I choose this one due to the high ratings. However, I compared this to the Braun and another oral thermometer and this was just so consistently inaccurate it is useless and possibly dangerous (e.g. one could send a fevered kid to school because the false reading says 97). The Braun and oral thermometers readings varied less than one degree whereas this one has a 4.5 degree range! Thinking it must be user error I read the manual a second time, but it did not help, I am returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Mostafitty

customer_reviews.title: Not even close to accurate
customer_reviews.text: Not accurate. You’re using a thermometer because you’re worried about your kid. Don’t get one that won’t give you an accurate read. This thing is a random number generator. I couldn’t get it to consistently give me the same temp for anyone in my household. After a minute I’d try again to test it’s accuracy and the person would be up to a full two degrees warmer then the last number.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Not working for me unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I’m guessing I must’ve gotten a thermometer that is not working properly. Just left my doctors office where my reading was 102.3. So far using the head I’ve gotten nothing over 99 and when I use it in the ear mode it doesn’t beep like it supposed to. I press the era button, place it in my ear and nothing happens. If I release it,it will read a temperature.. but none of the readings are even remotely close in number. I had high hopes for this, maybe I need to return it and try a new one?
customer_reviews.author: CMD

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, but terribly erratic temperature reporting.
customer_reviews.text: I knew my wife had a fever, but the range this provided was between 99.1 and 105.6 degrees on consecutive checks, ear and forehead. Worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Polivka

customer_reviews.title: Did not work- out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work. Consistently gave inconsistent readings- varying by at least 2 degrees. In one case, gave a 98.7 reading, then a 68.8 reading. Returned it; bought another Exogen.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer!!
customer_reviews.text: As a mother of three it’s important to have a reliable and good quality working thermometer in the house. Especially in the cold and flu season which we are in. This product is really nice, works great and even came with batteries already in it, ready to be activated. I live the carrying case it cane with and the instruction booklet was thick and very detailed. Easy to read and understand too. I would highly recommend this product to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Christina B.

customer_reviews.title: Terribly inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Terribly inaccurate. I’d avoid these scanner thermos and only use the insertable ones. Every time I scan, different result
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cheng

customer_reviews.title: No accuracy whatsoever
customer_reviews.text: This is HORRIBLE. Today my forehead temperature is 98.6 F, my right ear is 101.5 F, and my left ear is 103.9 F!
customer_reviews.author: Jill B

customer_reviews.title: Unit will not give accurate readings in ear mode.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot get accurate ear reading. Have troubleshooted and nothing works. Purchased unit in July 2017 and our first time actually needing it wasn't until now (Jan 2018). My two year old and I have the flu-not s time to find your expensive replacement thermometer isn't working. I'm too sick to be pissed at this moment! So, basically it was never used and now we're outside the return allowance timeframe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is completely inconsistent and does not give accurate readings. I took my son’s temperature in his ear and the reading was over 105. I then took it across his forehead and it was normal. This has happened numerous times in the month or so that I’ve had it. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and install
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use for my newborn baby girl. Easy to use and install, runs on two triple A batteries that comes with it. Thermometer came with a protective carrying bag as well. Appears to be accurate upon usage with the frontal probe. Haven't tried the ear mode yet but I bought the thermometer to use on the forehead anyway. Quick and easy readings - comes with an instructions manual.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Accurate & reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased at beginning of flu season last year, with the exception of several 'tests' it went largely unused. We are now in the middle of the pandemic and are 'spinning the wheels' off of this thing utilizing both modes. The ear canal mode has become the primary method of use and confirmed milder temperature elevations other methods of measurement do not (except that one that requires dropping one's pants, that method not utilized here). It is a most trusted device in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G.

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss.
customer_reviews.text: So I like the simplicity of this but the temperature measurements are a hit or miss. I tested it on myself and it said that I had a fever. I didnt. I used it on my 6 months and it said normal (but she has a fever, I used another rectal thermometer on her and it read 102.5). I probably wont use this anymore and would have returned it if my amazon return window didnt close yet. Please contact me for your satiafaction guarantee for full refund. It has been less than 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Pafoua Yang

customer_reviews.title: The instructions aren't as obvious as I would have liked. Once you learn it
customer_reviews.text: The readings were initially inconsistent till we learned to use the product. Four stars and not five because it took a little finesse to learn to use this product properly. The instructions aren't as obvious as I would have liked. Once you learn it, its a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Spruce

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for babies
customer_reviews.text: I like how essy it is to and the colors to indicate normal or high fever, but the readings are off by about 2.0 for my 5 month old. I took it to the doctor to have her test it with hers and ours read 102.2 and at the same moment the doctor’s read 99.5.... so now I don’t trust our thermometer. Maybe it works better when baby is older? Doctor told us to just take it under the arm for now with a regular digital thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bernhardt

customer_reviews.title: Consistent readings and quick easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is amazing. We were using the exergen thermometer and never got consistent readings. I was hesitant to try another temporal thermometer but so glad I did! This is quick and easy to use with accurate and consistent readings. We haven’t used the part for the ear yet, but the temporal scanner is amazing. I have a 1 and 2 year old and I’ve used it for both of them. A couple of degrees could mean the difference in an ER trip so a good thermometer is vital. If you are on the fence.. buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Maurer

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, good Metena Team
customer_reviews.text: When I received this it didn't work up to my standards, after writing a review I received an email from the Metena team! They were wonderful and offered to send me a free one or even there be updated one for free as well. I had already found a new one after the emailed me, but they were gracious enough to give me a full refund. May not have worked for me , but with the update it sounds they did, it's improving. Non the less they have a good team backing them to make sure you are satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: customer service sent a new one
customer_reviews.text: 2/18/19 *update* Since my initial review, I have been contacted by customer service and they gave me a full refund and sent out a different model for me to try. I’m pleased with how helpful they have been and look forward to trying the new model. I’ve had this for a little over 6 months now and it did work just fine for the 2 times I’ve needed it. But now it’s stuck reading in Celsius instead of Fahrenheit like I would prefer. I’ve tried holding the button down to change it and it doesn’t even bring up the “- - -F” option. So that sucks, it would have been a higher star had it worked properly.
customer_reviews.author: Hailie

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: This item is good to have if you need a quick measurement of temperature, like to know if one has fever, but don't expect it to be accurate. My daughter had high fever over 104F but this thing was showing 105, then less than a minute later 102.3, the temperature it was showing was always different. Even when i tried to test it on myself it was 97.7, 98.6, 97.8, 99.5 etc all in less than a minute same spot on forehead same person.
customer_reviews.author: IT

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have. I have wanted A forehead thermometer for a long time . I came across this on aim is on the price was really good so I decided to give it a try. My daughter got sick I tried it out it were to very well. I do like the carrying case it comes with so that I can put it in the car when we're on long trips being a mother of 5 children I feel this thing will come in handy to tell when they're faking or not on being sick.
customer_reviews.author: Stefany P.

customer_reviews.title: I do recommend, Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I would like to give this company 5 stars, I won't, because my first order did work properly. BUT Customer Service emailed me and send me replacement. Not even that, they also sent me extra better quality Thermometer to make sure, i am a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is so simple to use and switch between forehead and ear. With cap on, you hold the forehead button while you swipe from one temple to the other. You get an accurate temperature within seconds. To use the ear, you pop the cap off and use the other button. We tested accuracy with our pediatrician's and our pediatrician stated even he would recommend this thermometer. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Shamel

customer_reviews.title: Wish it would have worked, was a great idea
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was great. I got it some time ago used it on my sick daughter, worked great. Just pulled it out today to help my sister and her little one. And somehow we are getting all different kinds of temperature, so I tried it on myself and I am 117 Fahrenheit. Which is absurd because I am not sick haha However: they did resend me a new one at no cost or they were going to reimburse my money. I went with another one because I did really like it. And works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn Laubach

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to use and accurate!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because we are expecting our first child any day now. I have tried it many times and cross checked it with a traditional thermometer and it is extremely accurate and so easy to use! Just read the instructions and do as it says and it will be the easiest thermometer you have ever used! Also, through a scratch coupon the product came with, I won another one for free! Honestly, so far all is perfect and I would definitely recommend both the product and company!
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermometer!!
customer_reviews.text: The thermometer works great! Its reassuring to know during these times that you can take your accurate temperature in seconds! What's important to me is customer service along with communication with the company I purchase from and with that comes trust. I had a small problem on my side in which the company (Branda) went out of her way to help me with my issue, it was A+ Customer Service which today is unheard of, THANK YOU! Robert
customer_reviews.author: robert ditonno

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this thermometer. The way that the light is green if it’s good or red if it’s bad, allows my 9 year old to take her own temp and know if it’s okay. Also got my older 2 the forehead is great and the ear is perfect for my squirmy little new born. I would definitely recommend you try out this product, you won’t regret it. I do wish that there was covers for the ear prong to protect it from bodily fluids, however, all in all, it is an amazing product for an amazing price. The seller also had it shipped to me in no time at all. It’s everything I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Arrived much sooner than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I had expected it to take several weeks for the thermometer to arrive, but I think it came in less than a week. It is easy to use, and appears well put together. As for accuracy, I am going to take it with me to my next doctor’s appointment and ask my doctor to take my temperature while I’m there so I can compare with the reading from this thermometer. I’ll update my review after that.
customer_reviews.author: HappyCarnivore

customer_reviews.title: We have a hard time getting consistent readings.
customer_reviews.text: We got this when our child was an infant however we have a hard time getting consistent readings. We rarely use it now, depending more on the contact thermometers, in the armpit/mouth etc. It can vary 2-3 degrees on each swipe and sometimes that difference is important when it's an infant/child. The ear readings seem to be a little less variation however it still fluctuates. The beeping isn't not conducive to taking the temperature when a child is asleep either.
customer_reviews.author: Wraith7n

customer_reviews.title: Good thermometer for averaging temp
customer_reviews.text: First off, this will give you a close approximation of the temp, but it will fluctuate every time you use it. If used repeatedly on the same place, back to back you might get differences in temp of about a half degree with some exceptions being a full degree difference. When it does detect a fever it will light up red and green for normal temps. I would not use this for applications where extreme accuracy is important, but would use it for approximation of temp. It is easy to use, but would probably recommend the $55 Braun for a more accurate thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: ' != true;

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: It basically doesn’t work. You can get several different readings each time you use it. I was contacted by customer service and was compensated for the one that did not work and was sent one that worked much better! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Whillock

customer_reviews.title: Not Consistent or Reliable
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is not reliable. It will read a high fever of 103ish and then a few seconds later it will read a normal temperature checking the same spot. It's readings are all over the board between 90 and 105, I can never tell what temperature actually is with this. Pretty disappointed, I wish it worked out better. Not worth the hassle of returning for a $20 item, so I guess I just threw away my money. Bummer
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, but inconsistent.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, but very inconsistent. I got readings from 101.5 to 98.5 in a matter of minutes. I'm getting over the flu and would like to know if I still have a fever or not. Normally I find that the inconsistency is around 1 to 2 degrees. Since this is my only thermometer I have no way of knowing how accurate any of these readings are.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M.

customer_reviews.title: Its complicated and so is the instruction book.
customer_reviews.text: I was a RN for over 20 years and was smart enough to command a unit and give chemotherapy, it took 3 uses before I was comfortable with it. The removal section was also hard to remove the first time. I think the results took a week to stabilize before I trusted the answers.I'm considering changing the batteries. The tympanic route seems more reliable which makes sense. Glad I waited for a sale. Its good that its small and easily carried around.
customer_reviews.author: WendiPotts

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if mine was defective, but it sucked
customer_reviews.text: I'm a hospice nurse and so a good thermometer is vital. I found this thermometer to be highly and accurate as I checked it against my temporal thermometer. It continuously read lower then any other thermometer I used. It would be in the 96 degrees Fahrenheit range, but most of the time would read 97 even when a patient had a temperature. I was highly dissatisfied with the product and returned it within a week of receiving it.
customer_reviews.author: Cowballs

customer_reviews.title: Looks identical to the other one
customer_reviews.text: Since I need two, one for my household and the other one for my family, I was curious about this brand and the other ideas one on Amazon. The price and rating are similar and I want able to see the difference from the discription. The answer arrived with the packages! Both are just alike. Pro: Easy instruction, able to change the metric, eat and head converter , come with battery
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: I put a digital thermometer like this on my baby registry but kept taking off
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4 month old and was gifted a electric thermometer from Harris Teeter. It was cheaper, smaller, and never worked properly. I put a digital thermometer like this on my baby registry but kept taking off. Recently I have been wanting to check baby's temperature after his monthly shots. I tested it out both forehead and ears and it is accurate! Much better than the other junk I got as a gift. Excited to use this on myself and baby.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. It started giving wrong readings after a few uses. I changed batteries but nothing changed. I threw it away and bought the Braun brand which is much more reliable
customer_reviews.author: R. Shayya

customer_reviews.title: Wildly inconsistent and inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: My son currently has a fever, and I have been attempting to use this for five days now. I can legitimately run it (slowly, without lifting) across his forehead, temple to temple, and get grossly different results. It can read 99 one swipe, and literally 30 seconds later, read 105. A six degree window, nearly every time, is the most unbelievably large window when you have a sick child. The only consistency with this item is its inconsistency.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Fast, simple, convenient
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use at home after I used one very similar to it at work. This one doesn’t not disappoint! It is easy to use and self explanatory. I don’t use the ear portion of the thermometer unless I am rechecking a high fever. This is easy to clean, even the ear nozzle. The readout is fast and it’s backlit so I can read it in a dim room.
customer_reviews.author: AleshaJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ummm! Really! I have not needed this until the covid outbreak and it reads that I have a fever when I don’t. I have compared to two other thermometers and they read normal. The one time when knowing if you have a fever is important and it is completely wrong and yes, I hav read the manual and use it accordingly...going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, keep it cleaned though
customer_reviews.text: I did have a lesser opinion until common sense kicked in. It started reading 2-4 degrees off so I changed the battery and no difference. I was quite annoyed since it was just over a year old with minimal use. Then I cleaned the tip. Started reading accurately again. So, keep it clean and with new batteries and it works great! My son thinks it's super cool to get his temp checked sick or not.
customer_reviews.author: Sclinton

customer_reviews.title: Terrible! Doesn't work. Never the same temp twice!
customer_reviews.text: Lightning Deal turned out to be a big disappointment! I bought this on impulse for a great deal but it was a total waste of money! It never gave the same temperature twice and was always high than my other thermometer. It list 107, 106 degrees. Certainly not useful! Too bad I didn't use it soon enough to return the item. I won't choose this maker again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Not Accurate.  Returned.
customer_reviews.text: Gave different temperatures each time it was used on the same person in the same place. Not accurate. Returned. UPDATE--I received an email that offered me a gift card if I delete my review. Beware--I don't know if the same company sells all of these, but at least one (I bought on Prime) is trying to bribe away bad reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkie

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Throw in a diaper bag. Comes with a storage pouch. MUST TAKE READINGS SLOWLY AND DONT BREAK SKIN CONTACT for the best reading. Works great if directions are followed properly. Ear part is easy to use also and cleans well with alcohol swabs. *readings can be inaccurate if directions are not followed properly. Inproper contact with the skin can cause the device to give an incorrect reading
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Really cool thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased quiet a few thermometer and nothing is cool like this. It has a 2 mode detection, ear and head. Suitable for any person child through the old age people. It has great accuracy and it detects through infra red. comes with carry case and easy to carry in handbag or purse. It is so handy when needed and in case of emergency
customer_reviews.author: MockingJay

customer_reviews.title: USELESS. TEMP INACCURATE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this during a Christmas sale. I had not need to use it until the Covid-19 pandemic. It’s accuracy is repeatedly no where close, as it gives readings in the 70’s and 80’s indicating the person is pretty much dead.
customer_reviews.author: Shara

customer_reviews.title: Fast reading!
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is great and accurate. It’s very easy to use and came with battery. I also like the dust bag that they provided for travel. It has light for reading at night so you don’t have to turn on the light. It only takes second to read which is great because infant can be very impatient. I really like this product because it has both ear and forehead temperature detections. Overall, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Unsure if accuracy
customer_reviews.text: I really like how fast this thermometer is, but as a nurse I am doubting it’s accurracy. I took 3 separate temperatures from the forehead and got 98.3, 97.7, and 98.9 (all from the same spot). I then did three ear readings on the same person and got 99.8, 100.2, and 99.1. Also, the battery door falls off really easily. I really wanted this thermometer to be accurate because of how fast and easy it is to get a reading from my toddler (who won’t let me take an axillary reading with any other thermometer).
customer_reviews.author: A. Talley

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I've tried the forehead and ear and they're usually exactly the same. I got this because my kid needs to avoid infections and I have to check her often and so far it seems to be spot on, it said when my oldest had a fever and it turned out to be strep so I think this is super handy.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Easy to read.
customer_reviews.text: After using an oral thermometer for decades I’ve finally arrived into the 21st century. While oral thermometers will always hold a special place in my heart, in this world of instant gratification this fits the bill. Easy to use, easy to read, and fast results. Very pleased with this purchase. And it came much sooner than expected!
customer_reviews.author: Sudha A. Sharma

customer_reviews.title: but this is definitely better!
customer_reviews.text: We rarely get sick in our house, but when we do, we get SICK. My husband and son both got the flu and this made it so much easier to keep an eye on both fevers without having to worry about sanitizing the oral thermometer, and it's so much easier and faster to use! My kids aren't little anymore, so the oral thermometer is no issue with them, but this is definitely better!
customer_reviews.author: Debra M. Benge

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT Work!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible time (Coronavirus outbreak) for this product not to work. First time I tried it on my forehead it read 102. Waited 5 mins, tried again and it read 99. Waited 10mins, tried right ear and it read 88. Five mins later left ear read 77. Just tried my forehead again and it’s reading 99.3. I feel 100% fine. This gadget is an expensive rip-off.
customer_reviews.author: SocSciProf

customer_reviews.title: Have an active toddler that won’t stay in 1 place? Buy this.
customer_reviews.text: It took a bit for me to change the temperature (Celsius to Fahrenheit), but it is overall a good thermometer. Tried it on my mom and daughter and it works fine. I like the fact that I can use it either as a head or ear thermometer...haven’t tried the ear thermometer, but I’m sure it’ll be accurate for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Morales

customer_reviews.title: Seller knows about customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thermometer for work and it simply died within the week. I contacted the seller and they immediately sent me another one. if I could give FIVE stars I would but to the seller and not the product itself. The product gets three stars merely because I'm hopeful it will work better this second time around. However, the seller gets FIVE stars for its great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate reading
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a little irritating. The batteries constantly fall out of the back, I suggest tapping it closed. It also give different reading every single time. We bought this for our baby and ended up buying another one. If you need an accurate read, go for a more expensive one. If you need a general range, which is typically okay for adults, I’d say this one is fine. But because we have a newborn, we need something super accurate.
customer_reviews.author: A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Confusing
customer_reviews.text: Not satisfied with how it reads temperature. I felt it wasn't reading my daughter's temp right so I tried it on myself; it told me I had a fever of 101 and I wasn't even sick. Then again, I tried it days later on my daughter when she didn't have a fever anymore and it read fine. So idk. It's confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Ktmae

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate temperatures!! SCAM!!
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE!!-- adding to my original review because it's a SCAM! The company emailed me offering to give me a gift card for compensation if I deleted my review. Company is a total scam!! Don't waste your money! Ear and forehead temperatures are always way off. Took my forehead temperature swiping from one temple to the other and it said 98.4, took temperature in my ear and it was 101.4. Hasn't been accurate since we've bought it.. complete waste of money. Only good thing is the LED screen is easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany G.

customer_reviews.title: A Must for First-Time Parents
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Unique concept (to me) but effective. Way easier than sticking it in their mouth and trying to hold it there, like the cheap ones from the essentials kits you probably got. This is perfect for first-time parents- you're worried or scared and you get almost instant results with an easy indicator such as happy green smiley face = all okay, bad red face = something is wrong.
customer_reviews.author: GGM86

customer_reviews.title: Very inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: ALWAYS INACCURATE. Different temperatures every time. Totally not worth the money. I bought it for my 1 year old and it hasn’t worked correctly since I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Karla G

customer_reviews.title: Ok for an initial temp but you need to double check!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this thermometer for 9 months. I nearly had a heart attack the first time I used it on my newborn and it read 104.5 on his forehead. I took his temperature with several other old school thermometers (which he hated) and they all showed 99.4-ish. The ear reading is slightly closer but off. I can check myself and get anything from 97.3 to 101.4 depending on the angle. Wish I could trust it because it is hard to take the temperature of a wiggly, sick baby.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Its Fast and simple to read.
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is so easy to use. I had the traditional mouth one. It was a little hard to use when I had to put it in son's mouth but this one is simple, if he is asleep i just pass it by his forehead without even waken him up. I like the it lights up so if I'm reading the temperature at night I'm able to see it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Myrian Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and accurate! No complaints here.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to use and my children did not complain at all. I like the ability to check temperature while sleeping without having to disturb my children. I have special needs kids and this was perfect for them. I like that I do have option of checking temperature on forehead or by ear. I double checked accuracy with current thermometer and it was spot on. Great product in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Jules K

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the thermometer!
customer_reviews.text: This little thermometer is great! I like that it has the head and ear option so I can get the reading whichever way is better for us at the time. The display is bright and so easy to read. The instructions were clear and I was happy it came with batteries so i could use it right out of the box. It comes with a little felt bad that’s a nice touch and keeps it clean when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Jwallace

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate!
customer_reviews.text: Simple, fast, perfect for little kiddos. Thermometer is super easy to operate. Only takes a few seconds to read which is great when you have a toddler who isn’t feeling well and doesn’t want to be messed with. I appreciate that it stores some temps which makes it easy to keep track of a trend. Hope to not have to use this very much but when it’s needed I’ll be glad I have it!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian9110

customer_reviews.title: Must have for every house
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have item for any home. Especially one with kids. No one likes to take their temp with a regular thermometer, but the kids love to take their temp with this thermometer. It's very accurate and is super easy to use. My kids range from 16 to 1. It works for all of them and us adults too. This is now my go-to thermometer!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: The best thermometer I have used
customer_reviews.text: Love this thermometer and I have used quite a few of them. I like to use it in two places on the head when taking a temperature, in the very center and on the temple. I know this has to be a good thermometer because when I took my newborn for his first check up, his doctor had the same one. Also, my whole house got the flu and it was very efficient and worked well as I had to take 6 peoples temperature multiple times a day. Also the readings are pretty accurate and the reading is red when someone has a temp or boarderline has a temp!
customer_reviews.author: des

customer_reviews.title: Loved at first, then lost all credibility
customer_reviews.text: For a while we loved this thermometer, until we had to go to doctor and his temperature was a high 102... when thermometer read a low 99 (multiple times). Not sure what happened - always stored in a safe, cool place and didn’t use very often. Correct modes and everything (brought it to doc to make sure I was doing it right too!). So sadly all credibility for thermometer was lost after that incident. I don’t want to think about what my son’s temp was actually at a day before, When thermometer read a 101....
customer_reviews.author: Erica A

customer_reviews.title: readings does not match with regular thermometer
customer_reviews.text: good: rapid measurements bad: needs AAA batteries not rechargeable ugly: measurements do not match up with regular mechanical thermometer. With more research a calibration button needs to be provided. in case of patients with actual fever a low grade fever would be extremely difficult to detect with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: MITSCIENTIST

customer_reviews.title: Great and accurate device
customer_reviews.text: Great and accurate device. Compared readings against non contact meter and a thermal imager. It does make a calculation based upon whether you hit the ear button or the temple button. One star deduction for not having a way to shut off the really loud beep. Seriously, your placing the device in. An ear canal, and the beep is just really loud.
customer_reviews.author: Rick W

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, easy to use, noninvasive.
customer_reviews.text: With 4 boys under 9 years old this gadget is a very welcome addition to our medicine chest. The boys think its a light sabre. Ha ha. Its easy to use, seems accurate, and has been reliable thru flu/cold season. Works as advertised even on adults. Go gitcher-self one now!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly264

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and great new themometer!
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Inconsistent readings. I get a normal temp., then 99, 100, 101, 102 all within a minute. It’s going on the trash and I’m going to have to look for one that actually works. Update: customer service did a great job reaching out and giving me a full refund without me even returning the product. They also sent me a brand new themometer that works! Great customer service and they for sure read the reviews and care.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Woods

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: If you like panicking over a incorrect reading while pregnant this is for you. It was reading 102.4 and at doctor I was getting a read of 98.7. It is way off.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Jones

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for every home
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best products that I have ever used for a thermometer. It has become so popular in the workplace I have ordered approximately six of them. Extremely accurate readings I prefer using the temporal aspect of the thermometer. I have found that due to residual earwax readings are not as accurate in an adult If you’re using it for a child it works like a charm
customer_reviews.author: Pinhead954

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this
customer_reviews.text: I honestly hate this thermometer and wish I had spent $10 more to get a better one. The batter compartment won't stay closed and overall the thing feels very cheap. I don't think it's accurate either. You can take the temperature 5 times and get a different result each time. I will be buying a new thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: B&MKnowlton

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Well made and straightforward. I’ve tried out other store brands and I’m really not a fan of any of those. This has the looks and functionality, and very handy to have around.
customer_reviews.author: Kate C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and accurate!
customer_reviews.text: The forehead option is such a nice change to under tongue and inside ear. We have always struggled to get accurate temp readings when my five-year-old was a baby and a toddler. I love that you hit a button to turn on, then are able to use it immediately! Hold a button down while you slide temple to temple over the forehead, let go, then - BAM! - you have the temp.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Says everything is 108 or higher
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer has been used only about 20 times since I purchased it, and it has now been reading as if everything has a temp of 108 or higher. Pretty sure my babies and I don’t have 120° fevers! I’ve taken batteries out, changed them, and it won’t read accurately. Very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not consistent: (
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this two stars, for lack of accuracy. Out of the box we took temps of 3 people using the forehead reader all three had temps of 100.3, took temps in left ear, person one had a normal temp of 97.3, person 2 had a temp of 99.0 person 3 had a temp of 97.3. Took temps in right ear and everyone's temp was the same at 101.0 we've repeated this test numerous times with similar results.:/
customer_reviews.author: Momiilu

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. We needed a new one ASAP. My house all got sick a few days before Christmas! This was perfect, works well! Love that it has 2 different features for checking the temperature!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Evette

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: This product is very accurate and it can be read in two settings meaning if you’re unsure about the temperature for the ear. You're able to check the forehead it takes some getting use to for a few seconds but totally understandable after that. I like the fact that it has a color code system for the simple fact that sometimes people don’t know the difference between a low grade fever etc. I have no dislikes for the product and I would highly recommend it to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmine

product_meta.title: Metene Medical Forehead and Ear Thermometer,Infrared Digital Thermometer Suitable for Baby, Infant, Toddler and Adults
feature_bullets: FOREHEAD AND EAR MODE: Free to switch the detection mode from Forehead to Ear which is the easiest and most practical way to take temperature.

ACCURACY and RELIABILITY: Equipped with the most advanced medical infrared technology for accuracy and reliability. Recommended by experts following its vigorous tests to confirm its consistency and reliability.
MEMORY RECALL: Thermometer can store and recall up to 20 readings for baby and adults, available to help you track the trend of body temperature.
FAST AND ACCURATE READINGS: With 2 buttons Head and Ear,provides fast clinical accurate instant temperature within 1 second and precise reading. A loud beep will notify you it is done.
You Will Get : 1*Thermometer,1*Storage bag, 2*AAA Batteries,User Manual , free replacement if any quality issue for 12 months after the day of purchase.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars3,368 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
